title: Council Decision of 4 March 1996 appointing the members of the Consultative Committee of the European Coal and Steel Community
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 4 March  1996
appointing the members of the Consultative Committee of the European Coal and Steel  Community
(96/C  83/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members of the Consultative  Committee of the European Coal and Steel Community for the period 4  March 1996 to 3  April 1998  inclusive:
I.  PRODUCERS CATEGORY
>TABLE>
II.  WORKERS CATEGORY
BELGIUM

François CAMMARATA

The Council shall appoint the three Spanish members in the  workers category and one United Kingdom member in the workers category at a later date.
This Decision shall be published, for information, in the Official Journal of the  European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 March 1996.
For the Council
The President
P. BARATTA
(1) OJ No C 175, 26. 6. 1993, p. 1.
